files: ./packages/fte.js/package.json

{
  "name": "fte.js",
  "version": "3.0.0-canary.3bd5a0b",
  "bin": {
    "fte.js": "./bin/fte.js"
  },
  "description": "",
  "main": "./dist/index.js",
  "types": "./types/index.d.ts",
  "module": "./dist/index.esm.js",
  "exports": {
    ".": {
      "types": "./types/index.d.ts",
      "bun": "./src/index.ts",
      "import": "./dist/index.esm.js",
      "require": "./dist/index.js"
    }
  },
  "files": [
    "dist",
    "types",
    "src",
    "bin"
  ],
  "scripts": {
    "prepublish": "npm run clean && npm run build",
    "build": "npm run build:all",
    "build:cjs": "FORMAT=cjs bun build.ts",
    "build:esm": "FORMAT=esm bun build.ts",
    "build:all": "echo 'Building CJS...' && npm run build:cjs && echo 'Building ESM...' && npm run build:esm && echo 'Running TypeScript compiler...' && (tsc -p tsconfig.build.json || echo 'TypeScript compilation skipped due to module resolution issues') && echo 'Build completed.'",
    "watch": "tsc -w -p tsconfig.json",
    "clean": "git clean -dfqX -- {dist,node_modules}/** && rm -rf tsconfig.tsbuildinfo dist",
    "test": "vitest run",
    "test:watch": "vitest run --watch",
    "test:ui": "vitest --ui",
    "test:coverage": "vitest run --coverage",
    "bench": "vitest bench",
    "bench:run": "vitest bench",
    "dev": "bun run watch"
  },
  "keywords": [],
  "author": "",
  "license": "ISC",
  "dependencies": {
    "@babel/core": "^7.28.4",
    "@babel/generator": "^7.28.3",
    "@babel/parser": "^7.28.4",
    "@babel/preset-env": "^7.28.3",
    "@babel/preset-typescript": "^7.27.1",
    "@babel/traverse": "^7.28.4",
    "@babel/types": "^7.28.4",
    "@swc/core": "^1.13.5",
    "@swc/helpers": "^0.5.17",
    "chokidar": "^4.0.3",
    "commander": "^10.0.1",
    "fte.js-base": "^3.0.0-canary.3bd5a0b",
    "fte.js-parser": "^3.0.0-canary.3bd5a0b",
    "fte.js-standalone": "^3.0.0-canary.3bd5a0b",
    "fte.js-templates": "^3.0.0-canary.3bd5a0b",
    "glob": "^10.4.5",
    "lodash": "^4.17.21",
    "mem-fs": "^4.1.2",
    "mem-fs-editor": "^11.1.4",
    "ts-morph": "^27.0.0"
  },
  "gitHead": "8d33ce9c60578c6950cba4e67cf66a646d5f4a10",
  "devDependencies": {
    "@types/babel__core": "^7.20.5",
    "@types/babel__generator": "^7.27.0",
    "@types/babel__preset-env": "^7.10.0",
    "@types/babel__traverse": "^7.28.0",
    "@types/node": "latest",
    "esbuild": "^0.25.10",
    "typescript": "next",
    "vitest": "^3.2.4"
  }
}
./packages/fte.js-standalone/package.json

{
  "name": "fte.js-standalone",
  "version": "3.0.0-canary.3bd5a0b",
  "description": "",
  "main": "./dist/index.js",
  "types": "./types/index.d.ts",
  "module": "./dist/index.esm.js",
  "exports": {
    ".": {
      "types": "./types/index.d.ts",
      "bun": "./src/index.ts",
      "import": "./dist/index.esm.js",
      "require": "./dist/index.js"
    },
    "./compile": {
      "types": "./types/compile.d.ts",
      "bun": "./src/compile.ts",
      "import": "./dist/compile.esm.js",
      "require": "./dist/compile.js"
    },
    "./compileFull": {
      "types": "./types/compileFull.d.ts",
      "bun": "./src/compileFull.ts",
      "import": "./dist/compileFull.esm.js",
      "require": "./dist/compileFull.js"
    },
    "./compileLight": {
      "types": "./types/compileLight.d.ts",
      "bun": "./src/compileLight.ts",
      "import": "./dist/compileLight.esm.js",
      "require": "./dist/compileLight.js"
    },
    "./compileTs": {
      "types": "./types/compileTs.d.ts",
      "bun": "./src/compileTs.ts",
      "import": "./dist/compileTs.esm.js",
      "require": "./dist/compileTs.js"
    },
    "./parseFile": {
      "types": "./types/parseFile.d.ts",
      "bun": "./src/parseFile.ts",
      "import": "./dist/parseFile.esm.js",
      "require": "./dist/parseFile.js"
    },
    "./run": {
      "types": "./types/run.d.ts",
      "bun": "./src/run.ts",
      "import": "./dist/run.esm.js",
      "require": "./dist/run.js"
    }
  },
  "files": [
    "dist",
    "types",
    "src"
  ],
  "scripts": {
    "prepublish": "npm run clean && npm run build",
    "build": "npm run build:all",
    "build:cjs": "FORMAT=cjs bun build.ts",
    "build:esm": "FORMAT=esm bun build.ts",
    "build:all": "npm run build:cjs && npm run build:esm && (tsc -p tsconfig.build.json || echo 'TypeScript compilation skipped due to module resolution issues')",
    "watch": "tsc -w -p tsconfig.json",
    "clean": "git clean -dfqX -- {dist,node_modules}/** && rm -rf tsconfig.tsbuildinfo dist",
    "test": "vitest run",
    "test:watch": "vitest run --watch",
    "test:ui": "vitest --ui",
    "test:coverage": "vitest run --coverage",
    "bench": "vitest bench",
    "bench:run": "vitest bench",
    "dev": "bun run watch"
  },
  "keywords": [],
  "author": "",
  "license": "ISC",
  "dependencies": {
    "fte.js-base": "^3.0.0-canary.3bd5a0b",
    "fte.js-parser": "^3.0.0-canary.3bd5a0b",
    "fte.js-templates": "^3.0.0-canary.3bd5a0b"
  },
  "gitHead": "8d33ce9c60578c6950cba4e67cf66a646d5f4a10",
  "devDependencies": {
    "@types/node": "latest",
    "esbuild": "^0.25.10",
    "typescript": "next",
    "vitest": "^3.2.4"
  }
}

./packages/fte.js-formatter/package.json

{
  "name": "fte.js-formatter",
  "version": "3.0.0-canary.3bd5a0b",
  "description": "Formatter & Linter for FTE templates",
  "main": "./dist/index.js",
  "types": "./types/index.d.ts",
  "module": "./dist/index.esm.js",
  "exports": {
    ".": {
      "types": "./types/index.d.ts",
      "bun": "./src/index.ts",
      "import": "./dist/index.esm.js",
      "require": "./dist/index.js"
    },
    "./cli": {
      "types": "./types/cli.d.ts",
      "bun": "./src/cli.ts",
      "import": "./dist/cli.esm.js",
      "require": "./dist/cli.js"
    }
  },
  "bin": {
    "fte-format": "./dist/cli.js"
  },
  "files": [
    "dist",
    "types",
    "src"
  ],
  "scripts": {
    "prepublish": "npm run clean && npm run build",
    "build": "npm run build:all",
    "build:cjs": "FORMAT=cjs bun build.ts",
    "build:esm": "FORMAT=esm bun build.ts",
    "build:all": "npm run build:cjs && npm run build:esm && (tsc -p tsconfig.build.json || echo 'TypeScript compilation skipped due to module resolution issues')",
    "watch": "tsc -w -p tsconfig.json",
    "clean": "git clean -dfqX -- {dist,node_modules}/** && rm -rf tsconfig.tsbuildinfo dist",
    "test": "vitest run",
    "test:watch": "vitest run --watch",
    "test:ui": "vitest --ui",
    "test:coverage": "vitest run --coverage",
    "bench": "vitest bench",
    "bench:run": "vitest bench",
    "dev": "bun run watch"
  },
  "keywords": [
    "fte",
    "formatter",
    "linter",
    "templates"
  ],
  "author": "",
  "license": "MIT",
  "dependencies": {
    "@babel/generator": "^7.28.3",
    "@babel/parser": "^7.28.4",
    "fte.js-parser": "^3.0.0-canary.3bd5a0b"
  },
  "devDependencies": {
    "@types/node": "latest",
    "esbuild": "^0.25.10",
    "typescript": "next",
    "vitest": "^3.2.4"
  },
  "gitHead": "8d33ce9c60578c6950cba4e67cf66a646d5f4a10"
}
./packages/vscode-ftejs-lang/server/package.json

{
  "name": "ftejs-server",
  "private": true,
  "version": "0.0.1",
  "main": "dist/server.js",
  "scripts": {
    "clean": "git clean -dfqX -- {dist,node_modules}/** && rm -rf tsconfig.tsbuildinfo dist out",
    "build": "tsc -b && bun build.ts",
    "build:bundle": "bun build.ts",
    "build:types": "tsc -b",
    "watch": "bun --watch build.ts",
    "watch:types": "tsc -w",
    "test": "npm run build:types && vitest run"
  },
  "dependencies": {
    "fte.js-base": "3.0.0-canary.d23789d",
    "fte.js-parser": "3.0.0-canary.d23789d",
    "fte.js-formatter": "3.0.0-canary.d23789d",
    "fte.js-standalone": "3.0.0-canary.d23789d",
    "prettier": "^3.6.2",
    "vscode-languageserver": "catalog:dev",
    "vscode-languageserver-textdocument": "catalog:dev"
  },
  "devDependencies": {
    "@types/node": "latest",
    "vitest": "^3.2.4",
    "typescript": "next"
  }
}
